document_data.caption: A map showing the Bay of Omgar to the east of the Snout of Omgar.
document_data.name: Bay of Omgar
document_data.mainbody: The '''Bay of Omgar''' was located on the southern coast of [[Samarach]] on the [[Chultan Peninsula]] of [[southwest Faer√ªn]].
document_data.Geography: The [[Snout of Omgar]] formed most of the western boundary of the bay, with the eastern side curving around past the city of [[Samargol]] and the far southeastern edge of the [[Sanrach Mountains]].
